response.overview: Laughter and learning go hand in hand in this imaginative six-episode collection of Curious George, the two-time Daytime Emmy® award-winning series airing on PBS Kids®. Join the world's favourite monkey as he and his friends search for an egg's missing nest, rescue hungry bunnies, explore the magic of colours and much more. Through every fun-filled misadventure, George shows how curiosity can lead to great discoveries and new friendships.
response.title: Curious George: Egg Hunting
